author: mfreedman
msg: - 'client' subdirectory containing configuration for client only mode
The command 'tck' now generates a single html report file, $TCK_ROOT/target/portlet-bridge-testsuite-client-report.html.  I can't rename the tck.cmd itself, you'll have to.
- tck-generate-wars.cmd - calls 'mvn client install' with any  parameters the user cares to add, e.g. tck-generate-wars -Dtck.generate-war
- internal jetty testing (mvn clean install) generates reports in a single directory, $TCK_ROOT/target/, with an index, report-index.html.

author: jlmonteiro
msg: Remove Spring deps from CXF bundle

author: astitcher
msg: Load client side plugins just before creating the first Connection.
